trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <see cref="P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed" /> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: Termina l'istanza del flusso di lavoro in esecuzione, genera l'evento <see cref="P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed" /> nell'host e riporta informazioni sull'errore.

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Una volta terminato il flusso di lavoro, non può essere ripreso.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Consente di ottenere o impostare l'eccezione che ha provocato il termine dell'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: L'eccezione passata a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> è un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> se viene impostato solo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se viene impostato solo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>, tale eccezione viene passata a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se vengono impostati <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>, un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> viene passato con il <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>specificato, e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> è impostato come proprietà di eccezione di <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se non è impostato niente, viene creato un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> predefinito.

trans-unit.source: A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Un argomento di input della stringa con il motivo per la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.
Motivo della chiusura del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: L'eccezione passata a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> è un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> se viene impostato solo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se viene impostato solo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>, tale eccezione viene passata a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se vengono impostati <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>, un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> viene passato con il <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>specificato, e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> è impostato come proprietà di eccezione di <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se non è impostato niente, viene creato un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> predefinito.
